alert.note: Alert for Eastern Ascension; Southern Livingston; St. James; St. John The Baptist (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central St. John The Baptist, east central Ascension, northeastern St. James and southern Livingston Parishes through 245 PM CDT... At 215 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Garyville, or 7 miles northwest of Reserve, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Reserve, Laplace, Gramercy, Lutcher, Garyville, Wallace and Edgard. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 187 and 205. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Ascension; Southern Livingston; St. James; St. John The Baptist
